parameters.name: CheckType
parameters.description:
The data verification method. Valid values:

*   **1**: full data verification.
*   **2**: incremental data verification.

parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the verified source database.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the Data Transmission Service (DTS) task. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the task ID.

parameters.name: TbName
parameters.description: The name of the table verified in the source database.
